description: Looking for the pinnacle? Designed in tandem with alpine mountain guide partners, these fully-featured bibs are built with 80-denier 3-layer GORE-TEX PRO material to tackle summit after summit in the harshest conditions. When everything is equipment—and everything is on the line—reach for the ultimate in technical alpine protection.
name: Mountain Hardwear Routefinder GTX PRO Bib, Short - Mens
